Installing PiML¶

PiML currently supports various os platforms and python versions, including [py37, py38, py39] * [Win, Linux, and Macos].

You can install piml directly on these environments by

pip install piml

If you got the following error message:

ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement PiML
ERROR: No matching distribution found for PiML

You may need to upgrade the version of pip.
